title: Shoot 'em up Soundtrack Vol.1
description: This pack contains 25 carefully crafted, high energy tracks for your shoot ‘em up game! The tracks are between 1 and 2,5 minutes long and designed to loop seamlessly.
longDescription:
This music pack contains 25 carefully crafted, high energy tracks for your shoot ‘em up game! The tracks are between 1 and 2,5 minutes long and designed to loop seamlessly. For your convenience, I have also included menu music!


Preview

Demo with snippets of all 25 tracks can be heard here:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SNF25mmmCeY

https://on.soundcloud.com/AEVG7


Track listing

  1. Lightning Gun (1:30)
  2. Next Level (1:49)
  3. Neon Hero (1:25)
  4. To the Rescue (1:15)
  5. Black Hole (2:21)
  6. Interplanetary Highway (2:00)
  7. Duffy In (1:01)
  8. Dragon Star (1:53)
  9. Back Attack (2:24)
  10. Galactic Guardian (1:12)
  11. Wings of Gold (1:36)
  12. Lone Defender (1:59)
  13. Drone Swarm (1:26)
  14. Death Ray Dancer (1:36)
  15. Blood Moon (1:42)
  16. Meltdown (2:24)
  17. Starship Command (1:45)
  18. Orbital Strike (1:58)
  19. Flying High (2:06)
  20. Force Fields Forever (0:59)
  21. Night Flight (1:08)
  22. Galactic Groove (1:44)
  23. Lunar Assault (1:53)
  24. Starbridge (1:42)
  25. Surface Raid (1:51)


Bonus:

  • Menu Music (1:42)


The music is royalty-free, so you can use it in your game without restrictions. I own the copyright, however, so you cannot redistribute the music or include it as part of your game's OST!

The tracks are YouTube streaming safe, i.e. the video will not get flagged when someone streams your game, as these tracks are not in the content ID system.

I am happy to do custom work if you need something original!
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  25 original loopable tracks
  •  Menu music
  •  Ideal for shooter games

Number of Audio Wavs: 26

Number of Audio Cues: 26

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz/16 bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 44,5

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
